title: Business Card
description: Business card component representing an individual's or company's contact information and branding.

centered.title: Centered
centered.description: Whether the business card content is centered.

image.title: Background Image
image.description: A background or feature image displayed on the business card.

src.description: URL of the background image shown on the business card.

alt.description: Alternative text describing the background image.

logo.title: Company Logo
logo.description: The logo of the company or organization displayed on the business card.

src.description: URL of the company or organization logo.

url.description: URL to the company's website or landing page.

topic.title: Topic
topic.description: A headline or main topic for the business card, such as a job title or department.

address.title: Address
address.description: The physical or mailing address displayed on the business card.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: A profile image or avatar representing the person on the business card.

src.description: URL of the person's avatar or profile image.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: A list of contact methods for the person or business (e.g., email, phone, website).

icon.description: Icon name or identifier representing the contact method.

url.description: URL or link for the contact method, if applicable.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: A list of action buttons shown on the business card.
